notes.content:
if that won't work, I have another call to try out
```bash
curl --request GET \  --url https://api.eu-west-3.dev.nexthink.cloud/api/v1/arm/echo \  --header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJraWQiOiJGT3g2Qmlac2dwTEdOS1ZtcDJfaG5ZMGJoMjlhRTFub3lGek85TnM4bXFFIiwiYWxnIjoiUlMyNTYifQ..UwLe08qVEc_6wPuzjkD-3CTrJSwUC7Atay9AetI4gB-KCeu4WkZZe4QhE9TWhC4LLrR6v0iiVhU86dlWoQbYyi6ZKsrKm-qDfaGj3RPTBL-3gOJb2Ldz-yNa_vJQsswkBGHz2LxCR4122poyOQ5Uqu1Dh0WjF6LI93kZ6wWoRGaMKMpm0bayqqJLcWwLUrhZ1y6MNvmZSgYOOOv1uS8E3VoWdqj4LgQH0Ydq5hSDXve8BmtWFC9ilrmPRB8oNZTDivduoZ_3jYY1gK_hjN0T9EUpAK0Evr4aLSKiOHy_pLG0X_OzLdpQANxvNowsn1pTLAOwgevlqpe0-fOAa4ifLQ' same thing with Authorization: Bearer eyJraW..., replace with your portal token that you get from browser/insomnia plugin/curl
```

## Get a token :)

https://api.eu-west-3.dev.nexthink.cloud/api/v1/euf/campaign/trigger

l'addresse ou trigger mais cette fois il faut plus de tenant-UUID

```bash
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.eu-west-3.dev.nexthink.cloud/api/v1/token \
  --header 'Authorization: Basic NzU5ZTk1Zjg1ZjQyNDcyZmJiOTE5OWU0YWY1ZjlmODE6MnZSVWdPd2FveWxOY3NkUHI5NEQ4NmdfOURWTVhVSS10eUUyZFZXWQ==' \
  --data '{ "clientId":"759e95f85f42472fbb9199e4af5f9f81" }'
```

### Get a token
```sh
curl --request POST \
  --url https://eng-01-aws.dev.nexthink.cloud/auth/v1 \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
  --data username=nicolas \
  --data password=Nxt123456
```
